description.p: New UI Design, demo account, user preferences, notifications, and more.

discussion.p: This is a major upgrade to the visual appearance of the app. It also adds some new features, such as the addition of *[Edit List]* to the List of Forms. Form designers and account managers have additional features such as new styles for headings, pages, and buttons, as well as customizations to sorting and grouping and new TPL functions.

The login page now has clear buttons to erase the contents of the fields, a "Forgot your password?" button, and a "Try a Demo Account" button. Menus have changed, and new menu items for user settings has been added to change your password, display name, and various user preferences.
